metadata.name: Building Blocks
metadata.description:
It’s a collection of musical building blocks that to me represent the things that connect all my favourite music. Whether that’s James Blake, The Weeknd or Jamie xx; to me there is a sonic connection between the artists that inspire me which draws from alternative electronic influences. Building blocks gives creators a starting point for when inspiration is running low and you need an imperfect and emotional moment to get your creativity flowing.  
  
Samples included in this Kit:  
 - SOF_DrumLoop_Autumn Percussion_117  
 - SOF_DrumLoop_Fence Percussion_136
